operations.command:
cd /media/sam/1TB/claude-hooks-shared && git add -A && git commit -m "$(cat <<'EOF'
feat(ai-review): add quality-score-tracker, claudeflow-sync, framework-detector

Layered AI Review Architecture:
- quality-score-tracker.py: PostToolUse hook for pytest/ruff/mypy metrics
- claudeflow-sync.py: Stop hook syncs JSON+SQLite to QuestDB
- framework-detector.py: UserPromptSubmit hook detects SpecKit/CGSD
- ai_validation_service.py: FastAPI service for PR review (port 3848)

Quality Score Weights:
- code: 25% (ruff + mypy + bandit)
- test: 30% (coverage + pass rate)
- data: 25% (pandera compliance)
- framework: 20% (speckit.analyze)

Integrations:
- QuestDB tables: claude_quality_scores, claude_strategy_metrics
- Grafana dashboard: quality-score.json
- Global hive-mind.db at ~/.claude/hive-mind/

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)"

cd /media/sam/1TB/backstage-portal && git add -A && git commit -m "$(cat <<'EOF'
docs(ssot): add AI code review documentation

Backstage SSOT Documentation:
- docs/runbooks/ai-code-review.md: Layered defense architecture
- docs/runbooks/automation-workflows.md: Section 5 AI review
- docs/infrastructure/: Infrastructure docs

Features documented:
- Pre-push hook (Layer 1): ~/.claude/hooks/pre-push-review.sh
- PR Review (Layer 2): gptcompany/.github workflows
- AI Validation Service (Layer 3): localhost:3848
- Self-hosted runners: sam-workstation, org-shared-runner
- Quality scoring integration with QuestDB/Grafana

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)"
cd /media/sam/1TB/nautilus_dev && git diff --stat HEAD -- .env.enc 2>/dev/null | head -5

cd /media/sam/1TB/nautilus_dev && git add -A && git commit -m "$(cat <<'EOF'
feat(monitoring): add QuestDB claude_learning schema + quality dashboard

Monitoring Infrastructure:
- monitoring/schemas/claude_learning.sql: 5 new QuestDB tables
  - claude_quality_scores
  - claude_strategy_metrics
  - claude_strategy_trends
  - claude_agent_learning
  - claude_cross_repo_patterns
- monitoring/grafana/dashboards/quality-score.json: 13 panels

Quality Score Dashboard Features:
- Average quality score (7d)
- Score breakdown by category (code/test/data/framework)
- ClaudeFlow strategy performance
- Neural patterns table
- Recent quality scores

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)"

cd /media/sam/1TB/nautilus_dev && git push 2>&1 | tail -10

operations.command:
echo "=== CROSS-VERIFY: Files Existence ===" && for f in \
  "/home/sam/.claude/hooks/pre-push-review.sh" \
  "/home/sam/.claude/hooks/pre-push" \
  "/home/sam/.claude/canonical.yaml" \
  "/home/sam/.claude/hive-mind/hive-mind.db" \
  "/media/sam/1TB/claude-hooks-shared/hooks/metrics/quality-score-tracker.py" \
  "/media/sam/1TB/claude-hooks-shared/hooks/metrics/claudeflow-sync.py" \
  "/media/sam/1TB/claude-hooks-shared/hooks/intelligence/framework-detector.py" \
  "/media/sam/1TB/claude-hooks-shared/services/ai_validation_service.py" \
  "/media/sam/1TB/nautilus_dev/monitoring/schemas/claude_learning.sql" \
  "/media/sam/1TB/nautilus_dev/monitoring/grafana/dashboards/quality-score.json" \
  "/media/sam/1TB/backstage-portal/docs/runbooks/ai-code-review.md" \
  "/media/sam/1TB/backstage-portal/docs/runbooks/automation-workflows.md" \
  "/home/sam/.claude/plans/modular-snuggling-snail.md" \
  "/home/sam/.claude/plans/merry-zooming-sunrise.md"; do \
  test -f "$f" && echo "✅ $(basename $f)" || echo "❌ MISSING: $f"; \
done
echo "=== CROSS-VERIFY: Hooks in settings.json ===" && grep -E "quality-score-tracker|claudeflow-sync|framework-detector" ~/.claude/settings.json | wc -l && echo "hooks configured"

echo "=== CROSS-VERIFY: Services ===" && nc -zv localhost 3848 2>&1 | grep -q "succeeded\|open" && echo "✅ AI Validation Service (3848)" || echo "❌ AI Validation Service NOT running" && nc -zv localhost 9009 2>&1 | grep -q "succeeded\|open" && echo "✅ QuestDB ILP (9009)" || echo "❌ QuestDB NOT running" && nc -zv localhost 3000 2>&1 | grep -q "succeeded\|open" && echo "✅ Grafana (3000)" || echo "❌ Grafana NOT running"
echo "=== CROSS-VERIFY: Git Config ===" && git config --global core.hooksPath && echo "✅ Global hooks path set"

echo "=== CROSS-VERIFY: Plan Status ===" && grep -E "^\s*-\s*\[x\]" ~/.claude/plans/modular-snuggling-snail.md | wc -l && echo "completed items in snail plan" && grep -E "^\s*-\s*\[ \]" ~/.claude/plans/modular-snuggling-snail.md | wc -l && echo "pending items in snail plan"

echo "=== CROSS-VERIFY: N8N Workflow Spec ===" && grep -c "W7.1_AI_PR_Review" ~/.claude/plans/modular-snuggling-snail.md && echo "N8N workflow referenced in plan" && grep -c "n8n_workflows" ~/.claude/canonical.yaml && echo "N8N workflow in canonical.yaml"

echo "=== CROSS-VERIFY: Validation Config ===" && for repo in nautilus_dev UTXOracle N8N_dev LiquidationHeatmap; do test -f /media/sam/1TB/$repo/.claude/validation/config.json && echo "✅ $repo" || echo "❌ $repo MISSING validation config"; done
